title: Can I trade my new silver 2 account for my old bronze 3 banned account?
body: Very reformed and just would rather have my account i started playing league on instead of this one. Old account was RaubLol

replies.body: Hmmmm we can't trade accounts for banned ones.

In the same way that we can't trade content like skins between accounts, we can't trade suspensions across them either. The account in question is the one that was punished, so it wouldn't make much sense to put that punishment onto a different account.

It's still the same person that was punished. So why does it matter if a second account of theirs is punished instead?

Your rules are so strict, and mean.

> [{quoted}](name=SnugglePuggle94,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=Q9XggFZX,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-09-20T00:21:10.926+0000)
>
> Why?

It was banned for a reason, also once banned you aren't actually allowed to make another account according the the ToS which means that by admitting they have a second account that second account could now be banned if Riot actually cared enough.
